name: pl_id
description: Unique when combined with ds, tb, dateFrom, is also used as a foreign key in the Fact Destination table

name: ticket_id
description: Unique ticket ID, representing an itinerary

name: region_pair
description: Itinerary category, expressed as a connexion of 2 large traffic region continents

name: dt_of_issue
description: The date of the ticket issue (or exchange or refund)

name: nb_legs
description: Number of flights in the itinerary

name: leadtime
description: Number of days between issue date (considered local) and the first flight of the itinerary

name: first_flight_date_utc
description: Date of first flight of journey expressed as UTC date

name: journey_map
description: Concatenation of all leg map (aggregation of flight departure datetime, airport codes and class ) within the itinerary

name: classless_journey_map
description: Same as journey_map without the class information

name: sumP
description: Total price in USD associated to the itinerary by IATA

name: od_mile
description: Total distance in miles

name: leg_prices
description: Ordered list by itinerary of individual flight prices in USD

name: leg_miles
description: Ordered list of by itinerary individual flight distances in miles

name: mkt_carrier_code_list
description: Ordered list of by itinerary individual flight 2 letter code identifying the marketing carrier associated to the flight

name: operating_carrier_list
description: Ordered list of by itinerary individual flight 2 letter code identifying the operating carrier associated to the flight

name: mkt_carrier
description: List by itinerary of unique marketing carrier

name: op_carrier
description: List by itinerary of unique operating carrier

name: n_pkg
description: Number of KIWI package prices used to price the tinerary

name: price
description: KIWI price in euro

name: key_type
description: Category indicating the key used for matching, can take value classfull (if the class information could be used) classless otherwise

name: distribution_channel
description: Medium of the sale can take value AAGT (ARC/ASP saler), BAGT (IATA/BSP sale), IND ( Indirect sale, missing agency code number), DIR (Carrier direct sale), WEB (Carrier)

name: source_code
description: Origin of the sale takes values 1 ( ASP-settled transaction), 2 (Carrier-contributed Direct transaction) , 3 (BSP-settled transaction) or 4 (Carrier-contributed Indirect transaction)

name: ticket_document_amount
description: Total amont charged for the itinerary in USD

name: FILE_SOURCE
description: IATA file that the row came in so can analyse dt_of_issue lag, relationship to first_flight_date etc

name: prediction_price
description: BQML PREDICT output
